file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Innotech API backend
  description: >
    API for the Innotech backend
  version: 1.0.0

paths:

  ## Miscellaneous ###################################################################
  "/misc/ping":
    get:
      tags:
        - Ping
      operationId: getPing
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: param
          schema:
            type: string
            maxLength: 255
          required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Ping response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "schemas/_index.yaml#/pingResponse"

Error: parse: paths: /misc/ping: get: operation "getPing": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: reference "schemas/_index.yaml#/pingResponse": resolve reference "schemas/_index.yaml#/pingResponse": invalid schema reference "schemas/_index.yaml#/pingResponse"
